modName: Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP
summary:
Conversion of Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation to the 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage.
Thanks to  brokefoot for the permission and Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for the 7B bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/3739/am73.png[/img][/center]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] INTRODUCTION [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3]This mod is a conversion of [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415/?] Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation [/url][/b] to the 7B Cleavage Body

This Copilation is one of my all favorite armors on nexus.
The conversion process took me a long time to finish since it has a lot of armor parts.

I have reworked all body slots following a more "universal" bodyslots arrangement.
Is already compatible with Dual Shelth Redux and SOS.
If you find any issue post them in the comments section.

The original armor and all its textures are required! Links below.[/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] REQUIRED [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415/?] Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992//?] SeveNBase FemaleBody Replacer [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][color=crimson]A BBP Skeleton is required or you get a CTD - So choose one [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800//?] XP32[/url][/b] or  [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712/?] Skulltyrant's [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse![/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][color=Slategray][size=5pt] CREDITS [/size][/color][/font][/b]
[size=3]Special thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] brokefoot [/color][/b] for making the [b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415/?] Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation [/url][/b]
Please also endorse Brokefoots armor!

Much thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 [/color][/b] for the 7B body 
and variations!

[b][color=Lightsteelblue] XP32 [/color][/b] and [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Skulltyrant's [/color][/b] for the BBP and TBBP skeletons and a lot of compatibility between mods.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Nightasy [/color][/b] for making all the tutorials on 3ds MAX.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Shockero [/color][/b] for giving me some finishing tips on converting amors.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] SkyrimTuner [/color][/b] for the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/?] RealVision ENB [/url][/b]
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] missjennabee [/color][/b] for the amazing [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13608/?] Expanded Towns and Cities [/url][/b] - Screenshots in the mod were taken on Riverwood.[/size]


[b][color=Lightsteelblue][size=4] My other conversions [/size][/color][/b]
[b][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Assault Armor Sevenbase - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Sexy Tsuns Armor Mashup - Sevenbase-7B Cleavage [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45344/?] Misfit Mage - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45427/?] Nightshade Armor - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url][/b][/size]
